nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  The link has insufficient color contrast of 1.17:1 with the surrounding text. (Minimum contrast is 3:1, link text: #99d6ea, surrounding text: #dddddd)
  The link has no styling (such as underline) to distinguish it from the surrounding text
